text: Tommi Juhani Häti (born April 11, 1971 in Helsinki) is a Finnish male curler.Häti, Tommi | Curling.fi He is a and a bronze medallist. He competed at the 2002 Winter Olympics where the Finnish men's curling team placed fifth. He started curling in 1987 at the age of 17. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Alternate !
